Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia: 🔸 Ukraini...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia:🔸 Ukrainian forces are fighting to capture Korenevo.🔸 Russian forces repel attacks in Korenevo and inflict casualties on troops in Apanasovka, Kazachya Loknya, Malaya Loknya, and Snagost. There is also an attempt to recapture Spalnoe.🔸 There is a new front west of the Seim River, where the Ukrainian forces have occupied Otruba.🗺 @PoliticsGR
Forwarded From World Affairs Blog (Cody FTW)🇺🇸 -

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸 Capital Group reduces stake in Moscow Exchange from 5...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸 Capital Group reduces stake in Moscow Exchange from 5.01% to 0.064% due to June US sanctions, which target the market.The main shareholders at present are the Central Bank of Russia with 11.7%, SberBank with 10%, VEB with 8.4%, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development with 5.3% and State Street Bank & Trust Company with 5.3%. According to 2023 data, around 36% of shares were owned by US institutional investors, however this figure has likely plummeted till now.📝 Interfax🗺 @PoliticsGR

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia: 🔸 Ukraini...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia:🔸 Ukrainian forces advanced in the Korenevo direction, reaching its suburbs.🔸 Russian forces destroyed vehicles east of Sudzha, however they still remain in defensive positions.🔸 Amid circulating photos posted by the American PMC Forward Observation Group, allegedly showing their mercenaries participating in an attack on the Kursk region, US Ambassador Lynne Tracy has been summoned by the Russian Foreign Ministry, which accused the United States of direct involvement in the Ukraine conflict.🗺 @PoliticsGR
